de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.jrdf2vec

Class RDF2VecLight

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_mannheim.informatik.dws.jrdf2vec.RDF2VecLight
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRDF2Vec

    public class RDF2VecLight
extends Object
implements IRDF2Vec
    This class allows to generate walks and train embeddings for RDF2Vec Light.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Word2VecConfiguration configuration
      The training configuration to be used.
      static WalkGenerationMode DEFAULT_WALK_GENERATION_MODE
      Default walk generation mode.
      (package private) int depth
      Number of hops.
      private File entitiesFile
      File containing the entities for which an embedding shall be trained.
      (package private) boolean isEmbedText
      Indicator whether text walks (based on datatype properties) shall be generated and used for training.
      (package private) boolean isVectorTextFileGeneration
      Indicator whether a text file with all the vectors shall be generated.
      private File knowledgeGraphFile
      File with KG triples.
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOGGER
      Logger
      (package private) int numberOfThreads
      Default: Available Processors / 2
      (package private) int numberOfWalksPerEntity
      Walks to be performed per entity
      private String requiredTimeForLastTrainingString
      Variable which saves the time ti took to train a model as String (for the last run).
      private String requiredTimeForLastWalkGenerationString
      Variable which saves the time it took to generate walks as String (for the last run).
      (package private) File resourceDirectory
      Resources directory where the python files will be copied to.
      private File walkDirectory 
      private WalkGenerationMode walkGenerationMode
      Walk generation mode.

    • Field Detail

      • entitiesFile

        private File entitiesFile
        File containing the entities for which an embedding shall be trained.

      • knowledgeGraphFile

        private File knowledgeGraphFile
        File with KG triples.

      • numberOfThreads

        int numberOfThreads
        Default: Available Processors / 2

      • numberOfWalksPerEntity

        int numberOfWalksPerEntity
        Walks to be performed per entity

      • isEmbedText

        boolean isEmbedText
        Indicator whether text walks (based on datatype properties) shall be generated and used for training.

      • depth

        int depth
        Number of hops. You can also use uneven numbers. Depth 1: node -> edge -> node.

      • configuration

        Word2VecConfiguration configuration
        The training configuration to be used.

      • resourceDirectory

        File resourceDirectory
        Resources directory where the python files will be copied to.

      • requiredTimeForLastWalkGenerationString

        private String requiredTimeForLastWalkGenerationString
        Variable which saves the time it took to generate walks as String (for the last run).

      • requiredTimeForLastTrainingString

        private String requiredTimeForLastTrainingString
        Variable which saves the time ti took to train a model as String (for the last run).

      • DEFAULT_WALK_GENERATION_MODE

        public static final WalkGenerationMode DEFAULT_WALK_GENERATION_MODE
        Default walk generation mode.

      • walkGenerationMode

        private WalkGenerationMode walkGenerationMode
        Walk generation mode.

      • isVectorTextFileGeneration

        boolean isVectorTextFileGeneration
        Indicator whether a text file with all the vectors shall be generated. This is, for example, required when using the evaluation framework for KG embeddings.

      • walkDirectory

        private File walkDirectory

      • LOGGER

        private static final org.slf4j.Logger LOGGER
        Logger

      • RDF2VecLight

        public RDF2VecLight(File knowledgeGraphFile,
                    File entitiesFile)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        knowledgeGraphFile - File containing the knowledge graph.
        entitiesFile - File containing the entities, one per line.

      • RDF2VecLight

        public RDF2VecLight(File knowledgeGraphFile,
                    File entitiesFile,
                    File walkDirectory)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        knowledgeGraphFile - File to the knowledge graph.
        entitiesFile - File to the entities to be read.
        walkDirectory - Directory to which the walks shall be written to.

    • Method Detail

      • train

        public void train()
        Train an RDF2Vec Light model. The model will appear in the directory where the walks reside.

        public void setWalkFileDirectoryPath(String directory)

        Parameters:
